pages.text: Crystals are usually made by placing the corresponding dust in the $(l:machines/processors#pressurizer)Pressurizer$(/l). Crushed crystals are made by crushing Andesite, Diorite or Granite in the $(l:machines/processors#rock_crusher)Rock Crusher$(/l)
Crushed Rhondocrhosite is made by crushing Granite
Crushed Fluorite is made by crushing Diorite
Crushed Villaumite is made by crushing Granite
Crushed Carobbiite (yes, that's how it's spelled) is made by crushing Diorite
Cubic Boron Nitride is made by pressurizing Hexagonal Boron Nitride, which is made by crystallizing Boron Nitride Solution. More details in the Boron Nitride Processing Chain
Boron Arsenide is made by $(l:machines/processors#ingot_former)solidifying$(/l) Molten Boron Arsenide. More details in the Arsenic Processing Chain
